article_title: GOP Senate contest in Kuna, Meridian is rematch of 2014 race
article_text:
With no Democrat to face in November, the May 17 winner will take the seat

Candidates both embrace strict states rights view

article_metadata.news-keywords: Lori Den Hartog, Charles Porter, District 22, GOP primary, Idaho Senate, 2016 Idaho elections
article_metadata.description: Lori Den Hartog beat Charles Porter in 2014 for the District 22 Senate seat. The two candidates meet again in the May 17 GOP primary for the same seat. With no Democrat to face in November, the winner in the primary will take the seat.
article_metadata.title: GOP Senate contest in Kuna, Meridian is rematch of 2014 race | Idaho Statesman
